$:/plugins/boa/langswap/readme.title: $:/plugins/boa/langswap/readme
$:/plugins/boa/langswap/readme.text:
Plugin is:

* titled <<mono "BOA - Language page swapper">>,
* placed locally at [[$:/plugins/boa/langswap]],
* placed globally at [[https://protw.github.io/templ]],
* dependent on other plugins Shiraz and Utility.

The plugin sets an additional button {{$:/plugins/boa/langswap/img/UKR.svg}} (or {{$:/plugins/boa/langswap/img/GBR.svg}}) at the top right of a tiddler intended for switching between identical pages in //Ukrainian// and //English//. The name of the translated matching tiddler is written in the tiddler field <<mono swap>>.

For example, there are two matching tiddlers titled <<mono Стаття>> and <<mono Article>>, respectively in Ukrainian and English. In order to ensure correct transition from tiddler <<mono Стаття>> the value ''Article'' must be specified in its field <<mono swap>>, and the value ''Стаття'' in tiddler <<mono Article>> in the same field <<mono swap>>, respectively. Also, each of the two tiddlers must be tagged with their language, <<tag Ukr>> or <<tag Eng>>, respectively.

Additionally, the plugin creates (contains) two tag tiddlers [[Ukr]] and [[Eng]], each of which stores an ordered list of all the tiddlers tagged with the ''Ukr'' or ''Eng'', respectively. The order of the tiddlers in these lists can be rearranged using //drag-and-drop// by pre-clicking on the tag icon ''Ukr'' or ''Eng''. And that's not all - there are a couple of navigation buttons <<mono "previous | next">> in the bottom of each tiddler from the list. The functionality specified here is provided with a <<mono "simple-navigation">> macros, which is part of the plugin [[$:/plugins/kookma/utility]].

Also, the plugin creates two plane content tables <<mono Зміст>> and <<mono Content>> based on the [[Ukr]] and [[Eng]] tags, respectively. These two tables of content are placed in the sidebar. The code inside these two tiddlers creating the table of content of the wiki can be customized by a user to whatever else.

!! Localization of the plugin

The localization of this plugin presumes its readjustment into an alternative arbitrary pair of languages. This process comprises the following simple steps:

# put the plugin code somewhere at your computer as plain text file titled (by default) `$__plugins_boa_langswap.tid` and open it by a text editor a type of //Notepad//;
# perform substitution through the whole document of the language names <<mono Ukrainian>> and <<mono English>> into two names of the selected alternative languages.
# perform substitution through the whole document of the tokens <<mono Зміст>> and <<mono Content>> into two equivalent terms of the word //Content// in the two selected alternative languages, accordingly.
# perform substitution of the //svg-code// of the two flags containing in the field <<mono text>> in tiddlers $:/plugins/boa/langswap/img/Ukr.svg and $:/plugins/boa/langswap/img/Eng.svg with //svg-code// of a selected pair of alternative languages. Two tips: 
#* both width and height given inside the custom //svg-code// is <<mono 16px>>; 
#* do not forget to arrange escape characters inside the //svg-code// according to rules of the JSON-format;
# perform substitution through the whole document of 
#* the token <<mono Ukr>> to a token of the first selected alternative language, say, <<mono Lang1>> and 
#* the token <<mono Eng>> to a token of the second selected alternative language, say, <<mono Lang2>>;
# that's all, use and enjoy...

$:/plugins/boa/langswap/Component-descri.text:
This plugin contains the following shadow tiddlers:

|table-striped-row|k
|!Component|!Description|
|^$:/plugins/boa/langswap/swapbutton |^The swap button macro code |
|^$:/plugins/boa/langswap/img/Eng.svg |^Great Britain's flag |
|^$:/plugins/boa/langswap/img/Ukr.svg |^Ukrainian flag |
|^[[Eng]] |^Tag ''Eng'' tiddler, contains macros `<<simple-navigation tag:Eng>>` for `previous | next` navigation |
|^[[Ukr]] |^Tag ''Ukr'' tiddler, contains navigation macros `<<simple-navigation tag:Ukr>>` for `previous | next` navigation |
|^[[$:/plugins/boa/langswap/content-Ukr]] |^This tiddler contains the custom TOC in Ukrainian transcluded by `{{Зміст}}` and is used for displaying TOC at the side bar.  |
|^$:/plugins/boa/langswap/content-Eng |^This tiddler contains the custom TOC in English transcluded by `{{Content}}` and is used for displaying TOC at the side bar. |
|^[[Зміст]] |^Container for customizable Ukrainian TOC |
|^[[Content]] |^Container for customizable English TOC |
|^$:/plugins/boa/langswap/readme |^Readme |
|^$:/plugins/boa/langswap/Component-description |^This component description |
$:/plugins/boa/langswap/Component-descri.title: $:/plugins/boa/langswap/Component-description
